snippet: As political rivals attack Mitt Romney's record at Bain Capital, a private equity lobbying group is planning a campaign to try to repair the industry's public image.
abstract: As political rivals attack Mitt Romney's record at Bain Capital, a private equity lobbying group is planning a campaign to try to repair the industry's public image.
lead_paragraph: It was a long-held fear of Wall Street's private equity titans. If Mitt Romney won the Republican nomination in 2012, the industry would come under intense scrutiny and withering attacks from his opponents.

headline.main: With Romney Under Attack, Private Equity Fights Back
